field.name: summary
field.value: Errors and unexpected behavior binding arrays (build 456)

field.name: description
field.value:
In the attached code you'll find two examples of arrays of string being passed to the controller upon a submit. One array is filled with values from two individual textboxes and one array is filled with values from a number of selected checkboxes (that have initially been generated with a FormHelper.CreateCheckboxList).
The array built from individual textboxes behaves differently from RC2 in the following way: there are two textboxes. If I fill only one, in RC2 the bound array would be of size 1. In build 456, however, the bound array is of size 2, with the second element equal to null.
The array built from the checkboxes yields an error when the binding is attempted: "Error building method arguments. Last param analyzed was selectedFacilities with value '' ".
